verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> upon Gittith, <WH1665> A Psalm <WH4210> of David. <WH1732> O LORD, <WH3068> our Lord, <WH113> how <WH4100> excellent <WH117> is your name <WH8034> in all <WH3605> the earth! <WH776> who <WH834> have set <WH5414> your glory <WH1935> above <WH5921> the heavens. <WH8064>

Out of the mouth <WH6310> of babes <WH5768> and sucklings <WH3243> have you ordained <WH3245> strength <WH5797> because <WH4616> of your enemies, <WH6887> that you might still <WH7673> the enemy <WH341> and the avenger. <WH5358>
When <WH3588> I consider <WH7200> your heavens, <WH8064> the work <WH4639> of your fingers, <WH676> the moon <WH3394> and the stars, <WH3556> which <WH834> you have ordained; <WH3559>
What <WH4100> is man, <WH582> that you are mindful <WH2142> of him? and the son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> that you visit <WH6485> him?
For you have made him a little <WH4592> lower <WH2637> than the angels, <WH430> and have crowned <WH5849> him with glory <WH3519> and honor. <WH1926>
You made him to have dominion <WH4910> over the works <WH4639> of your hands; <WH3027> you have put <WH7896> all <WH3605> things under <WH8478> his feet: <WH7272>
All <WH3605> sheep <WH6792> and oxen, <WH504> yes, <WH1571> and the beasts <WH929> of the field; <WH7704>
The fowl <WH6833> of the air, <WH8064> and the fish <WH1709> of the sea, <WH3220> and whatever passes <WH5674> through the paths <WH734> of the seas. <WH3220>
O LORD <WH3068> our Lord, <WH113> how <WH4100> excellent <WH117> is your name <WH8034> in all <WH3605> the earth! <WH776>
